data.name: Bot_AccountRegisteredSuccessfully
data.value: Binding of the account is completed successfully. Welcome to participate in competitive bot activities. Execute the __**/play repeatedly**__ command on the channel of the event of interest to register.

data.name: Bot_AccountRegisteredSuccessfullyHtml
data.value:
SS Tournaments Bot by elamaunt


Account linking completed successfully. Welcome to tournaments! Repeat the play command on the tournament channel in Discord to sign up.

data.name: Bot_AreAlreadyLeftTheEvent
data.value: > You have already left this activity.

data.name: Bot_AreNotregisteredInEvent
data.value: > You were not registered.

data.name: Bot_CommandNotImplemented
data.value: This command has not yet been implemented.

data.name: Bot_DataBaseUpdateError
data.value: > Failed to update the data in the database.

data.name: Bot_Greetings
data.value: Hello friends! **SS Tournaments Bot** is at your service and ready to hold events for you. Use **/slash** commands to register for them. Have fun playing!

data.value: > Failed to update the data in the database.

data.value: > Such a user does not exist.

data.value: >>> Your opponent with the nickname **{0}** cannot be called. He may have left the server. >>> He will be given a technical defeat.

data.value: > At this point your opponent has not yet been identified.

data.value: > You have already confirmed your participation.

data.name: Commands_AddBots
data.value: Throw bots in the tournament (for tests)

data.name: Commands_AddTime
data.value: Delays or speeds up the next event (for admins)

data.name: Commands_BanMaps
data.value: Permanently ban maps in your matches

data.name: Commands_BanPlayer
data.value: Ban player

data.name: Commands_Call
data.value: Call your opponent to the game

data.name: Commands_Checkin
data.value: Confirm your participation

data.name: Commands_CheckInBots
data.value: Checkin all bots from the tournament (for tests)

data.name: Commands_DeleteUser
data.value: Deletes user profile (for admins)

data.name: Commands_Drop
data.value: Reset the current state of the tournament (for admins)

data.name: Commands_ForceBotMatches
data.value: Ends active matches with bots by losing one of the bots (for tests)

data.name: Commands_ForceEvent
data.value: Forces the following event (for admins)

data.name: Commands_Info
data.value: Get current information about the next event

data.name: Commands_KickBot
data.value: Exclude bot from the tournament (for tests)

data.name: Commands_KickBots
data.value: Exclude all bots from the tournament (for tests)

data.name: Commands_KickPlayer
data.value: Exclude a player from the tournament

data.name: Commands_Leave
data.value: Leave the activity or exclude yourself from registration

data.name: Commands_Matches
data.value: Output the list of active matches

data.name: Commands_MyId
data.value: Outputs your discord user id

data.name: Commands_Play
data.value: Register for an activity or change your race

data.name: Commands_Players
data.value: Display a list of registered players

data.name: Commands_RatedUsers
data.value: Display a list of users with a rating (for admins)

data.name: Commands_RebuildCommands
data.value: Rebuilds all bot commands (for admins)

data.name: Commands_RefreshLeaderboard
data.value: Update the leaderboard (for admins)

data.name: Commands_RegisterUser
data.value: Add a user to the database (for admins)

data.name: Commands_SetUsersScore
data.value: Change the rating value of the user in the database (for admins)

data.name: Commands_Start
data.value: Immediately starts the tournament starting with the checkin

data.name: Commands_Status
data.value: Find out your status in this activity

data.name: Commands_SubmitGame
data.value: Count the game (for tests)

data.name: Commands_Time
data.value: Displays the current time and the remaining time to the next event

data.name: Commands_Timeline
data.value: Output the schedule of all scheduled events

data.name: Commands_User
data.value: Output user information from the database (for admins)

data.name: Commands_Users
data.value: Display a list of users in the database (for admins)

data.name: Commands_View
data.value: Outputs the current tournament grid (for tests)

data.name: Commands_Vote
data.value: Start voting

data.name: Commands_VoteAddTime
data.value: Start voting to add time

data.name: Commands_VoteBan
data.value: Start voting to ban a user

data.name: Commands_VoteKick
data.value: Begin voting to exclude a user from the tournament

data.name: Commands_Wait
data.value: Get/Remove 'Waiting for Tournaments' role

data.name: Events_ActivityCheckinStarted
data.value: Attention! {0} AutoCup {1} Checkin phase has begun. All participants must run the __**/checkin**__ command on the activity channel to confirm their participation. The checkout is open until the end of the checkout, but new participants do not need to call the */checkin** command, the */play* command is enough.

data.name: Events_ActivityNotCounted
data.value: A winner is determined, but the tournament will not be counted, as it consists entirely of technical defeats. At least one game must be played.

data.name: Events_ActivityStarted
data.value: The activity *{0} AutoCup {1}* begins!

data.name: Events_ArchiveHeader
data.value: _**{0}**__ is safely finished! Congratulations to the player named __**{1}**__. We wish the rest of you good luck in the next events!

data.name: Events_Bracket
data.value: Grid:

data.value: >>> **Matches to be played in the current stage of the event:**

data.value: Full grid:

data.value: >>> Played Matches:

data.value: --- On the resting bench this time:

data.name: Events_RulesRemind
data.value: **Don't forget to use DowStats and an attached Steam account, otherwise the match won't count!**

data.name: Events_SingleMatchNotFinished
data.value: > The only match in this stage has not yet been completed. The completion of this stage has been postponed for __**5 minutes.**__

data.name: Events_StageCompleted
data.value: The stage has been successfully completed! The next stage will begin after a {0} minute break.

data.name: Events_StageCompletionDelayed
data.value: > Half or more matches are still to be played. The completion of the stage has been postponed for __**5 minutes**__.

data.name: Events_StageTimeInfo
data.value: A new stage has begun. There is a __**{0}**__ countdown to the end of the stage.

data.name: Events_TechLoseToPlayer
data.value: > A technical defeat was awarded to the player with the nickname **{0}**.

data.name: Events_TournamentCancelledNoPlayers
data.value: Event has been cancelled, because there are not enough participants. Next event will start when {0} participants are registered again.

data.name: Events_UnableToStartNoPlayers
data.value: At the moment, the activity cannot be started because there are not enough participants. Minimum number of participants is 4. The list of registered participants has been reset.

data.name: Events_VotingCancelledCauseMatchFinished
data.value: > The voting result is not accepted because the match has been completed.

data.name: Events_VotingHasBeenEnded
data.value: > Voting is complete.

data.name: Events_VotingResultNotDefined
data.value: >>> Voting result is not accepted, because the votes are divided equally, or no one voted. But still need to make a decision, so the technical defeat is given to the player at the discretion of the bot.

data.name: Events_WeGotWinner
data.value: A winner has been determined!

data.name: Event_NextStageStarted
data.value: >>> The next stage begins! Generating brackets...

data.name: Play_InstructionsMessage
data.value: To participate in bot activities, you need to confirm the connection of your account with Steam. To do this, first add your Steam account to the integration in your Discord account profile settings. Make the integration publicly visible and then click the link below to confirm it. Only Steam accounts with at least 300 games played in total in the DowStats service can register for the activity.

data.name: Play_NotEnoughGames
data.value: >>> Not enough games on your Steam account. Only Steam accounts with at least **300 games played** total in the DowStats service can register for tournaments. Return back when you have played more games :)

data.name: Play_RegisterIntroMessage
data.value: >>> To register in the system, you need to attach your Steam account to your profile. Instructions are sent in personal messages.

data.name: Play_Successfull
Play_SuccessfullAndChekined
